task.title: Clean Invalid Characters
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove invalid characters from a TMX file.

context.p: TMX is an XML-based vocabulary and thereafter a TMX file must not contain characters not allowed by the XML standard.
A TMX file that contains invalid characters cannot be edited without removing those characters first.

step.cmd: In main menu, select File Clean Invalid Characters... .
Use the dialog that appears to locate and select the file that you want to repair.

taskbody.result: A progress indicator is displayed while the selected file is cleaned and a backup of the original data is saved in the same folder.
